content: One of the smartest things J.J. Abrams did as director of The Force Awakens was to invent a new story and a new cast of characters, but retrofit them to the narrative of George Lucas’s first three Star Wars films. The Force Awakens was set up to mirror A New Hope, and from the looks of this teaser, The Last Jedi will run parallel to The Empire Strikes Back — only now, Luke is Yoda, training Rey, who is this trilogy’s Luke, who is probably her dad.
